data.why:
Finance::Bank::FR::SocieteGenerale::Pro Finance::Bank interface to
    French ``Société Générale'' bank website for professionals/companies
    (distinct from the website & interface to individual accounts)
    [idea, needed RSN]

    Net::DRI : domain registries API ala DBI with EPP & RRP protocols
    [pre-alpha, strong experience on topic, having already designed a
    similar solution]
